org.springframework.cache.jcache.interceptor.JCacheOperation

Packages that use JCacheOperation
Package
Description
org.springframework.cache.jcache.interceptor
AOP-based solution for declarative caching demarcation using JSR-107 annotations.

  • Uses of JCacheOperation in org.springframework.cache.jcache.interceptor

    protected abstract JCacheOperation<?>
    AbstractFallbackJCacheOperationSource.findCacheOperation(Method method, Class<?> targetType)
    Subclasses need to implement this to return the caching operation for the given method, if any.

    JCacheOperationSource.getCacheOperation(Method method, Class<?> targetClass)
    Return the cache operations for this method, or null if the method contains no JSR-107 related metadata.
